;Among thousands of adjectives, we always use purity to describe friendship, because friendship is the most equal relationship among all emotions, and it is also the most comfortable way to get along. Contact us when you need it, and it can still be kept fresh when you don’t contact us, and the longer it lasts The stronger the relationship.

;;Love is different. The essence of love is self-love;. ;

;From the moment I fell in love with you, the relationship between us can no longer be described as pure, because what follows is possessiveness, sensitivity, clinginess, and suspicion. When you cross the boundary of friendship and fall in love, you will never be satisfied with the status quo. You will think randomly, care about every punctuation mark the other person sends, how many seconds it takes the other person to reply to the message, and who the other person talks too much to. After a few words, your heart is already in chaos. Friendship is not like this, or friendship is not always like this.

;“Okay. "The other party's voice sank, but quickly came up again, "Actually, that's not bad. It's a lucky draw after all. ”

;

;“Yes, and the hairtail there is very fresh. When is it convenient for you, can I send it to you? ”

;

;On the way to pick up his children from school, he stopped at the intersection and she went down to give him the coupon code.

;

;When she came out, she happened to meet the man who had shared the coupon code with her. But he was not empty-handed, instead he was carrying a beautiful and petite girl on his arm. She stared at him, her eyes almost gleaming with fire, as they turned the corner. She took two steps and caught up behind them. She heard him laughing, and the girl raised her face. Oh my God, the radiance and joy on her face overflowed.

;

;She was shaking all over, and her hands hanging down could not be clenched into fists. She took out her mobile phone and tried desperately to delete it all, delete him, delete his number, delete his text messages, delete them... She flicked the phone for a while and raised her head.

;

;The clear August sun shines on her, how lucky she is. She stretched out her hand and held the top that the woman handed back. This is a lucky draw.

;

;She returned to the car. He picked it up and twisted his body. He looked at her: "What are you happy about?" ”

;

;“I am happy. ’ she said.

;

;He also smiled: "I am also happy that you are happy." How happy you are. ”

;

;The car started driving and kept driving until it snowed in winter.
